speaker: 1. "CEO Sashidhar Jagdishan
quote: 'FY '25, we would probably grow slower than the system. FY '26, we may be at or around the system growth rate. FY '27, we should be faster than the system growth rate.'

speaker: 2. "CEO
quote: 'As we speak today, we are in an extremely comfortable position. Obviously, there are risks in the system... but we are well positioned looking at our portfolio and don't have too much of a worry at this juncture.'

speaker: 3. "CFO Srinivasan Vaidyanathan
quote: 'In cards, we are the number one. In auto, we will be the number one. Various products on the retail non-mortgage, we are the market leaders across various product segments.'

speaker: 4. "CEO
quote: 'We want to ensure that the balance sheet and our financial statements are very resilient in the medium to long-term.'

speaker: 5. "CFO
quote: 'The industry has grown anywhere between 10.5%, 11%. And we have grown more than that, gaining market share any time period, if you take a year, three years or five years, between 50 to 70 basis points a year.'

speaker: 6. "CEO
quote: 'We have maintained a very matched modified duration of our balance sheet. Our view is that we should not have too much of an impact in the range at which we have been operating the margins in the near term.'

speaker: 7. "CFO
quote: 'Our non-performing loans, GNPAs at 1.36% or thereabouts, retail GNPA is at about 0.8%.'

speaker: 8. "CEO
quote: 'Liquidity has been gradually improving over the last couple of months... However, the deposit rates continue to be elevated and sticky.'

speaker: 9. "CFO
quote: 'Adding every quarter, a little more than 2 million customer base coming in, shows that the credits do increase, and we are seeing robust increase in the credits.'

speaker: 10. "CEO
quote: 'Our objective has been to make those investments and branches now when the credit has been benign... to go into more areas where we need reach, but even in cities to make it much denser.'
